BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-VolumeViewer
BundleInfo.Author: UCSF RBVI
BundleInfo.Description: Volume Viewer is a tool for visualizing volume data, 3D numerical data sets such as electron density maps. The data can be shown as solid or mesh isosurfaces (contour surfaces) or as partially transparent solids.
